IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED
		  STATES

official-title.#text:
To reinstate and extend the deadline for
		  commencement of construction of a hydroelectric project involving the American
		  Falls Reservoir.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall, at the request of the licensee for
			 the project, and after reasonable notice and in accordance with the procedures
			 of the

under that section, reinstate the license and extend the time
			 period during which the licensee is required to commence the construction of
			 project works to the end of the 3-year period beginning on the date of
			 enactment of this Act.

text.#text: Notwithstanding the time period specified in

header.#text:
Extension of time for Federal Energy
			 Regulatory Commission project involving American Falls Reservoir

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S276 ES: To reinstate and extend the deadline for commencement of construction of a hydroelectric project involving the American Falls Reservoir.
